feed.title: philipdefranco TikTok
feed.subtitle: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from philipdefranco

entry.title: US To Send Another Aircraft Carrier To Israel #usa #israel Israel is now getting hit by Mortars from Syria in addition to rockets from Lebanon, and Israel is responding with counter-battery fire. So far 1,000 Israelis have been killed with another 3,400
entry.content: US To Send Another Aircraft Carrier To Israel #usa #israel Israel is now getting hit by Mortars from Syria in addition to rockets from Lebanon, and Israel is responding with counter-battery fire. So far 1,000 Israelis have been killed with another 3,400 injured and 900 Palestinians have been killed with another 4,500 injured. Israel is preparing a months-long ground campaign in Gaza according to Egypt. With Egypt also saying that Israel has dismissed their efforts to mediate any kind of de-escalation according to the Times of Israel. With the Times saying it’s believed that Israel wants to destroy Hamas before entertaining a ceasefire. The United States may deploy a 2nd aircraft carrier strike group to Israel according to the Wall Street Post. The USS Gerald Ford has arrived off the coast of Israel and will likely begin operations tonight. And this has made Erdogan very mad at Israel and the United States. He angrily asked today: “Why is the US aircraft carrier coming to Israel? For what? What will they do? Will they hit Gaza with their warplanes and commit a massacre?”. Jake Sullivan responded saying: "Let me be clear: we did not move the carrier for Hamas. We moved the carrier to send a clear message of deterrence to other parties who may seek to widen the war”.

entry.title: Putin Blames America For Terrorist Attack On Israel #usa #israel Zelensky will visit Israel in a show of solidarity according to axios. He was among the first leaders to call Israel to offer his support, he is also one of the only Jewish heads of states
entry.content: Putin Blames America For Terrorist Attack On Israel #usa #israel Zelensky will visit Israel in a show of solidarity according to axios. He was among the first leaders to call Israel to offer his support, he is also one of the only Jewish heads of states in the world. This comes as Putin blamed the United States for Saturday’s terrorist attack. Hamas is now denying that it killed civilians in Israel, but their attack on Saturday is now the 2nd deadliest terror attack in the history of the West, superseded only by 9/11. The Wall Street Journal says that the IDF killed at least 1,500 terrorists on Saturday while the terror attack was ongoing. Sweden has now cut aid to Palestine.

entry.title: Israel Strikes Syria In Growing War #usa #israel Israel struck Syria’s two main airports last night to put them out of service according to Al-Jazeera, which is thought to have been done to stop Iranian assistance. https://x.com/IAFsite/status/1712484101
entry.content: Israel Strikes Syria In Growing War #usa #israel Israel struck Syria’s two main airports last night to put them out of service according to Al-Jazeera, which is thought to have been done to stop Iranian assistance. https://x.com/IAFsite/status/1712484101763342772?s=20has also dropped over 6,000 bombs on Gaza since Sunday. The IDF also claims that they have a list of everyone who participated in the terror attack and that the air force will reach every one of them. The UK will send part of the Royal navy to Israel as a show of support and to conduct surveillance flights over israel. The US and Qatar have reached a “quiet understanding” to not give Iran any of the 6 Billion that was unfrozen, according to CBS News. 27 Americans have now been killed in the attacks on Israel, 14 are still missing. Secretary Blinken in Israel today said “This is the equivalent of ten 9/11s” - what he means is population scaling. If what happened in Israel happened in America that would mean 48,000 people dead. France has banned Pro-Palestine protests because they are “likely to generate disturbances to the public order”

entry.title: Israel Gives 24 Hours To Evacuate Gaza #usa #israel Israel has told the United Nations that they have 24 hours to evacuate Northern Gaza to the south. But The UN says that its impossible to evacuate 1.1 million people in less than 24 hours. And Hamas is
entry.content: Israel Gives 24 Hours To Evacuate Gaza #usa #israel Israel has told the United Nations that they have 24 hours to evacuate Northern Gaza to the south. But The UN says that its impossible to evacuate 1.1 million people in less than 24 hours. And Hamas is telling people not to evacuate, saying its propaganda according to Al-Jazeera. Israel is expected to begin its ground invasion of Gaza as soon as this weekend. Iran says that there is a real possibility of more fronts opening against Israel. Human rights Watch has accused Israel of using White Phosphorus while others have accused them of flat out revenge bombing.

entry.title: Terror Attack Rocks France As Israeli Invasion Is Imminent #usa #israel Israel has told a hospital in Northern Gaza that they have two hours to evacuate according to doctors without borders. The hospital says this is just not possible. Politico says Isra
entry.content: Terror Attack Rocks France As Israeli Invasion Is Imminent #usa #israel Israel has told a hospital in Northern Gaza that they have two hours to evacuate according to doctors without borders. The hospital says this is just not possible. Politico says Israel’s ground invasion is imminent. The US is urging Israel to delay their imminent ground operation until safe passage for Palestinians can be secured. Meanwhile Egypt says Israel’s mass evacuation notice is a serious breach of international humanitarian law but Egypt has also taken “unprecedented measures” to reinforce its border with Gaza to prevent any breaches and is resisting pressure from the US to open a humanitarian corridor for Palestinians according to the Financial Times. Biden says it’s a priority of his to address this humanitarian crisis, and that the overwhelming majority of Palestinians had nothing to do with Hamas and the appalling attacks. France has declared a maximum security alert because a knife attack done by an Islamic terrorist in France has been linked to the events we just discussed. Macron said that the French Police thwarted another attack earlier in the day. Macron said France had been “hit once again by the barbarity of Islamist terrorism.” The UK is drawing up rules to deport foreign students, academics, and workers who commit antisemitic acts or praise Hamas.
